Doc: A type defining the specification of settlement terms, occuring when the settlement currency is different to the notional currency of the trade.

Source.Contents:
/#
   A type defining the specification of settlement terms, occuring when the settlement currency is different to the notional currency of the trade.
 #/
record FpML5.transparency.SettlementProvision {
  # The currency that stream settles in (to support swaps that settle in a currency different from the notional currency).
  settlementCurrency : string

}

settlementCurrency.Doc: The currency that stream settles in (to support swaps that settle in a currency different from the notional currency).
settlementCurrency.Name: settlementCurrency
